pages.text: Takes damage the deeper you submerge in water along with reducing breath
pages.title: Abyssal Crush

pages.text:
To counteract the crushing effects, It is advised to traverse with a Submarine and suit up with Diving Gear. Each increasing the amount of reduction 
(IF CREATE IS PRESENT) Create Diving Gear is a viable alternative to such,at the cost of slow movement native to the armor
Deep Ones affect player reputation, depending on whether promoting or destroying the ecosystem
pages.title: Ecological Reputation
